result: Basic API token authentication is no longer supported. To access the Printful API go to https://developers.printful.com/ to create a new OAuth 2.0 token for your store and change the authentication token from Basic to Barer. Migration guide is available under the link https://help.printful.com/hc/en-us/articles/4632388335260-What-should-I-know-about-API-key-to-API-token-migration-

error.message: Basic API token authentication is no longer supported. To access the Printful API go to https://developers.printful.com/ to create a new OAuth 2.0 token for your store and change the authentication token from Basic to Barer. Migration guide is available under the link https://help.printful.com/hc/en-us/articles/4632388335260-What-should-I-know-about-API-key-to-API-token-migration-
